

.. _file_necsim_Landscape.cpp:

File Landscape.cpp
==================



Contains the :ref:`class_Landscape` class implementation for easy referencing of the respective coarse and fine map within the same coordinate system. 


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none
